traits.name: Assassin
traits.innate: At the start of combat, Assassins leap to the enemy backline.
traits.description: Assassin's Abilities can critically strike and they gain bonus Critical Strike Chance and bonus Critical Strike Damage.

traits.name: Caretaker
traits.description: Caretakers deploy with a Baby Dragon that can be placed anywhere on the battlefield. The Baby Dragon gains 80% of its Caretaker's Attack Speed, and restores 80 Mana to the Caretaker upon death.

traits.name: Brawler
traits.description: Brawlers gain additional maximum Health.

traits.name: Cavalier
traits.innate: Innate: Cavaliers charge quickly towards their target whenever they move.
traits.description: Cavaliers take reduced damage. At the start of combat and after each charge, this effect is doubled for 4 seconds.

traits.name: Cruel
traits.description: A Cruel champion hungers to be alone against exactly 1 enemy left standing.

traits.name: God-King
traits.description: God-Kings deal 20% bonus damage to enemies who have at least one of their Rival Traits. This effect is only active when you have exactly 1 unique God-King.

traits.name: Invoker
traits.description: All allies gain extra Mana from their attacks.

traits.name: Knight
traits.description: All allies block a flat amount of damage from all sources.

traits.name: Legionnaire
traits.description: Legionnaires gain bonus Attack Speed, and their first attack after casting an Ability heals them for 50% of the damage dealt.

traits.name: Mystic
traits.description: All allies gain Magic Resist.

traits.name: Ranger
traits.description: Rangers gain bonus Attack Speed every 4 seconds, and lose it every 4 seconds, This effect begins 4 seconds after combat starts.

traits.name: Renewer
traits.description: Skirmishers gain a shield at the start of combat, and bonus Attack Damage each second.

traits.name: Skirmisher
traits.description: Skirmishers gain a shield at the start of combat, and bonus Attack Damage each second.

traits.name: Spellweaver
traits.description: Spellweavers have bonus Ability Power, which increases whenever any champion uses an ability (up to 10 times).

traits.name: Abomination
traits.innate: When 3 allied champions have died, the Monstrosity will rise from its grave. The Monstrosity receives bonus Health and Attack Damage based on allied Abomination champions' star levels.
traits.description: The 3 Abomination champions nearest the grave will also grant the Monstrosity a random copy of one of their items when combat starts.

traits.name: Coven
traits.description: At the start of combat, the champion nearest to the center of your Coven champions is chosen as the Coven Leader, gaining 60% bonus Ability Power.

sets.active: Each time a Coven champion casts, 15% of the cost is bestowed upon the Coven Leader as Mana.

traits.name: Dawnbringer
traits.description: Dawnbringers rapidly heal some of their maximum Health the first time they drop below 50%. When this occurs, all allied Dawnbringers gain 10% bonus damage.

traits.name: Draconic
traits.description: In Hyper Roll, dragon eggs hatch a lot faster!

sets.active: At the end of each player combat, gain a dragon egg on your bench. The bigger the egg, the longer it takes to hatch, and the rarer the reward.
Dragon eggs are golden! Golden eggs hatch into even rarer loot.

traits.name: Dragonslayer
traits.description: After the first Dragonslayer ally scores a takedown on an enemy with at least 1400 maximum Health, all allies gain additional Ability Power for the rest of the round.

sets.active: 30% Ability Power for Dragonslayers, 20% for team
70% Ability Power for Dragonslayers, 50% for team

traits.name: Eternal
traits.description: Wolf separates from Lamb, and can be placed anywhere on the battlefield. Wolf does not count toward your team size, and receives all of Lamb's stat bonuses.

traits.name: Forgotten
traits.description: Forgotten champions have bonus Attack Damage and Ability Power. Each Shadow item held by a Forgotten champion increases these bonuses by 10% on all Forgotten champions, stacking up to 4 times.

traits.name: Hellion
traits.description: Whenever a Hellion dies, a Doppelhellion (a one less star copy) will leap from the Hellion portal and join the fight!

traits.name: Ironclad
traits.description: All allies gain Armor.

traits.name: Nightbringer
traits.description: Nightbringers gain a shield for 8 seconds equal to a percent of their maximum Health the first time they drop below 50%. When this occurs, that Nightbringer gains bonus damage.

traits.name: Redeemed
traits.description: Redeemed champions have increased Armor, Magic Resist, and Ability Power. When they die, their bonus is split among remaining Redeemed allies.

traits.name: Revenant
traits.description: Revenants revive after their first death each combat. Once revived, they take and deal 30% increased damage.

traits.name: Verdant
traits.description: Champions that start combat adjacent to at least one Verdant ally are immune to crowd control for a duration.

items.name: B.F. Sword
items.description: Gain Attack Damage.

items.name: Recurve Bow
items.description: Gain Attack Speed.

items.name: Needlessly Large Rod
items.description: Gain Spell Power.

items.name: Tear of the Goddess
items.description: Gain Mana.

items.name: Chain Vest
items.description: Gain Armor.

items.name: Negatron Cloak
items.description: Gain Magic Resist.

items.name: Giant's Belt
items.description: Gain Health.

items.name: Spatula
items.description: It must do something...

items.name: Sparring Gloves
items.description: Gain Critical Strike Chance and Dodge Chance.

items.name: Deathblade
items.description: Contributing to a kill grants the holder addtional Attack Damage for the rest of combat.

items.name: Giant Slayer
items.description: The holder's spells and basic attacks do bonus damage. If the target has more health, the bonus damage increases.

items.name: Hextech Gunblade
items.description: The holder's spells heal them for a percentage of the damage dealt. Excess healing fuels a shield that protects the holder.

items.name: Spear of Shojin
items.description: The holder's basic attacks restore Mana on-hit.

items.name: Guardian Angel
items.description: Prevents the wearer's first death, reviving them after a short delay and sheding all negative effects.

items.name: Bloodthirster
items.description: Basic attacks heal the holder for a percentage of the damage dealt.

items.name: Zeke's Herald
items.description: When combat begins, the wearer and nearby allies in the same row gain Attack Speed for the rest of combat.

items.name: Sword of the Divine
items.description: The holder gains the Divine trait.

items.name: Infinity Edge
items.description: Grants Critical Strike Chance. Each point of Critical Strike Chance above 100% becomes bonus Critical Strike Damage.

items.name: Rapid Firecannon
items.description: The holder gains Attack Range, and their Basic Attacks can't miss.

items.name: Guinsoo's Rageblade
items.description: Basic Attacks grant bonus Attack Speed for the rest of combat.

items.name: Statikk Shiv
items.description: Every third Basic Attack from the wearer deals Magic Damage to nearby enemies, and true damage if they are shielded or crowd-controlled.

items.name: Titan's Resolve
items.description: When the wearer takes damage or inflicts a critical hit, they gain a stacking damage bonus. The damage stacks up to a limit, at which point the wearer gains Armor and Magic Resistance, and increases in size.

items.name: Runaan's Hurricane
items.description: Basic Attacks fire a bolt at another nearby enemy, dealing a percentage of the wearer's Attack Damage and applying on-hit effects. These bolts can critical strike.

items.name: Zz'Rot Portal
items.description: When the wearer dies, a Construct arises to continue the fight.

items.name: Duelist's Zeal
items.description: The holder gains the Duelist trait.

items.name: Last Whisper
items.description: When the wearer inflicts a critical hit, the target's Armor is reduced for a number of seconds.

items.name: Rabadon's Deathcap
items.description: The holder gains additional Spell Power.

items.name: Luden's Echo
items.description: When the holder casts their spell, the first target dealt magic damage and to nearby enemies are dealt additional magic damage.

items.name: Locket of the Iron Solari
items.description: When combat begins, the wearer and nearby allies in the same row gain a shield that blocks damage for several seconds.

items.name: Ionic Spark
items.description: Nearby enemies have their Magic Resist reduced. When they cast a spell, they are zapped taking magic damage equal to a percentage of their max Mana.

items.name: Morellonomicon
items.description: When the holder deals damage with their spell, they burn the target, dealing a percentage of the target's maximum Health as true damage over several seconds, and reducing healing by a percentage for the duration of the burn.

items.name: Spirit of the Dragon
items.description: The holder gains the Dragonsoul trait.

items.name: Jeweled Gauntlet
items.description: The holder's spells can cause critical hits, and the holder gains bonus Critical Strike Damage.

items.name: Blue Buff
items.description: After casting their spell, the wearer gains Mana.

items.name: Frozen Heart
items.description: Reduces the Attack Speed of nearby enemies. Each Frozen Heart a champion carries beyond the first increases the radius of this effect.

items.name: Chalice of Power
items.description: When combat begins, the wearer and all nearby allies in the same row gain Spell Power for the rest of combat.

items.name: Redemption
items.description: When the wearer dies, allies are healed.

items.name: Mage's Hat
items.description: The holder gains the Mage trait.

items.name: Hand Of Justice
items.description: At the beginning of each planning phase, the wearer's basic attacks and spells deal additional damage or heal for a percentage of damage dealt.

items.name: Bramble Vest
items.description: Negates bonus damage from incoming critical hits. On being hit by a Basic Attack, deal magic damage to all nearby enemies.

items.name: Gargoyle Stoneplate
items.description: The holder gains Armor and Magic Resist for each enemy targeting them.

items.name: Sunfire Cape
items.description: At start of combat, and every couple seconds thereafter, a random nearby enemyis burned for a percentage of their maximum health. Any healing they receive is reduced.

items.name: Vanguard's Cuirass
items.description: The holder gains the Vanguard trait.

items.name: Shroud of Stillness
items.description: When combat begins, shoots a beam straight ahead that delays affected enemies' first spellcast, increasing their max Mana until they cast.

items.name: Dragon's Claw
items.description: Reduces incoming magic damage.

items.name: Zephyr
items.description: When combat begins, the wearer summons a whirlwind on the opposite side of the arena that removes the closest enemy from combat for several seconds.

items.name: Elderwood Sprout
items.description: The holder gains the Elderwood trait.

items.name: Quicksilver
items.description: The wearer is immune to crowd control for the first several seconds of combat.

items.name: Warmog's Armor
items.description: Grants bonus Health.

items.name: Warlord's Banner
items.description: The wearer gains the Warlord trait.

items.name: Trap Claw
items.description: Blocks the first enemy spell that hits the wearer, and stuns the spell's caster for several seconds.

items.name: Youmuu's Ghostblade
items.description: The wearer gains the Assassin trait.

items.name: Thief's Gloves
items.description: At the beginning of each planning phase, the wearer equips 2 temporary items. Temporary items increase in power based on your player level.

items.name: Anima Visage
items.description: The wearer regenerates a percentage of their maximum Health each second.

items.name: Death's Defiance
items.description: A percentage of the damage the wearer receives is instead dealt over time as non-lethal damage.

items.name: Eternal Winter
items.description: Enemies who damage the wearer have their Attack Speed slowed for several seconds. After being slowed this way a certain number of times, the attacker is Frozen for the duration instead. An enemy can only be Frozen once every several seconds.

items.name: Manazane
items.description: After the wearer casts their spell for the first time each combat, they restore Mana over several seconds.

items.name: Obsidian Cleaver
items.description: The wearer's attacks and spell damage shred enemy Armor and Magic Resistance by 40% for several seconds.

items.name: Randuin's Sanctum
items.description: At the start of combat, all allies adjacent to the wearer gain bonus Armor and Magic Resistance for the rest of combat.

items.name: Rocket-Propelled Fist
items.description: At the start of combat, the wearer pulls the farthest enemy into melee range, stunning them for several seconds. Allies within range will prioritize attacking that enemy.

items.name: Gold Collector
items.description: The wearer executes enemies below a percentage of health on hit. Executions generate 1 gold.

items.name: Zhonya's Paradox
items.description: The first instance of damage that would reduce the wearer below a percentage of their Health is prevented, causing them to become invulnerable for several seconds.
